explains: v. 模仿，仿效；作滑稽模仿；仿造，伪造

sentences.en: Teachers provide a model for children to imitate.
sentences.cn: 教师是孩子仿效的典范。

sentences.en: He could imitate in speech or writing most of those he admired.
sentences.cn: 他能在口语或书写中模仿大多数他崇拜的人。

sentences.en: She knew that the girls used to imitate her and laugh at her behind her back.
sentences.cn: 她知道那些女孩子过去常在背地里模仿她、嘲笑她。
